column4: i am having trouble with ndiswrapper on my hp laptop. can someone help me?
thanks dcraven. i'll check it out
i received a fatal error when i executed the modprobe ndiswrapper command
I have found the drivers for my cards chipset and installed them
here is the exact error:
FATAL: Error inserting ndiswrapper (/lib/modules/2.6.10-5-386/kernel/drivers/net/ndiswrapper/ndiswrapper.ko): Operation not permitted
it was ran as root
have you been asking about that all week?
and please just use the ndiswrapper stuff in ubuntu
does that work?
are you using the ndiswrapper stuff from ubuntu?
you're using sudo, right?
actually, i activated root and logged in as root
why? and don't do that.
i get tired of typing sudo every 10 seconds
then use sudo -s
then i'll fiddle around with it using sudo, and see how it goes
after running 'ndiswrapper -l', it says invalid driver, yet it came directly from the source. any ideas?
no, sorry, I've never used ndiswrapper
what chipset do you have, btw?
its an agere chipset. it is the orinoco proxim 8420-wd
the driver is wlagsall.inf. it came driectly from the install CD and the website
